acf.post_copy:
Holiday Survey!
We are currently conducting an important research study about Holiday shopping preferences.
If you choose to take the survey, please answer the questions about your Holiday shopping preferences in general, not about Alexandria Mall specifically.  However, the answers you provide will be used to help enhance the shopping experience at Alexandria Mall.
In return for your participation, you can be entered in a drawing for a chance to win a $100 gift card from an Alexandria Mall retailer of choice.  Entries must be received by midnight Eastern Time Friday, October 6th. 
The survey is brief and should only take about five minutes to complete.  Your responses are strictly confidential and no one will try to sell you anything as the result of your participation.
To begin, please click the survey link below: 
https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/5XWC6H5
